pr_title: 6527: Cleaned up MessageNode createSheet to remove dup values

timeline.message: Cleaned up MessageNode createSheet to remove dup values

timeline.bodyText:
I know this is not part of your change, but 'fromID" is a terrible name in this context to denote the "type id of the artifact from which to get the attributes.
I've tripped on it multiple times.
timeline.author: raman-bt
